about.me:
Analyst, developer and architect of Java-based solutions and their APIs and Frameworks. Knowledge in NodeJS, AngularJS and Angular 2 and superior versions, SQL and NoSQL databases and basic cloud knowledge with AWS. Knowledge in patterns like SOA, DDD, CQRS, TDD.
 With managerial experience in other business activities and leadership of teams in the technological career.
 Enthusiastic about new technologies, I value teamwork and knowledge sharing, always attentive to what the market have novelty to technological solutions.
 I value the all workplace, from the relationship between the team, projects in progress to the physical structure of the place and quality of life offered at work.

prime.name: Prime IT
prime.activities:
Acting as architecture specialist, allocated on the BNDES, with following developer environment: Java EE (JSF, JSP, CDI, EJB), Websphere Application Server, Websphere Process Server, Websphere Integration Developer, Business Process Manager (BPM). I am one of those responsible for performing architecture validation, standards and code quality as well as refactoring them for adaptation to customer developer patterns and TDD practices.

Worked assembling and validating reponsive Web / Mobile architecture using Angular 4 with backend in Spring Boot providing Restful services for new Bradesco development architecture.

bemobi.name: Bemobi
bemobi.activities:
Working with Value Added Services (VAS) integration solutions from Telecom operators, mobile subscriber services and purchase of standalone media. With responsibility for creating new services and improvements in integration platforms.

Main Environment: Java, Spring, Spring MVC, Hibernate, Camel, EJB.

Architecture jobs: Deployment of a URL Shortener and creation of a client project for the same API for communication of other company projects.
Communication clients projects with company partners.
API deployment for communication with Google Analytics and abstraction of usual company features.

I started and created the architecture of a project with Drools to implement a rule engine for use in all company services, the project was continued by the team and put into production later.

Main Company Platforms:

Subscription - Platform responsible for performing the subscription cycle in a certain service (Sign, renew and cancel).

Infosender - Platform responsible for firing SMSs from content, news broadcasts and advertisements, urgent news and others.

MUM - Platform responsible for communicating with the operator's VAS for receiving and sending SMS and charging for services.

Bemobi API - API developed internally for use of company resources by content partners and services.

INPO - Platform that functions as a "state machine" that has the responsibility of checking the text sent by the user in the SMS and responding accordingly.
